What is it about? Taking three famous episodes (Cat Orgy, Two Guys Naked In A Hot Tub and Jewbilee), to create the first ever South Park fanedit. 

Original name: Cat Orgy/Two Guys Naked In A Hot Tub/Jewbilee
New film name: The Meteor Shower: A Night In South Park
Film studio name: Comedy Central/South Park Studios
Edit crew name: Ghostcut Pictures
Date original was released: 14th-28th July, 1999
Date edit was released: 20th December, 2007
Original runtime: 66 minutes
New runtime: 63 minutes
Amount of time cut/added: 3 minutes cut
Cuts added/removed/extended:

    * Completely reorganised the episodes to fit the structure of a film. This means removing the title sequences and reorganising the events to jump between characters.
    * Reframed every shot in 1.77:1 anamorphic widescreen

Your intention for this fanedit: To make the first ever South Park fanedit.
Hardware and software information:

    * K-Lite Codec Pack
    * VirtualDubMod
    * Sony Vegas 7
    * DVDx

Time needed for the editing: 2 days

-------

About this file:
* Container: AVI
* Video: DivX
* Audio: AC3 Stereo

-------

A full DVD version is in the works, with tons of special features planned. Check back on fanedit.org for updates on this and hundreds of other fan edits.

-------

Why would someone want to download an edited version of South Park? Because the events have been meticulously rearranged to transition between the three characters&#039; separate stories into a complete whole. A person with an actual life edited this, in their very limited spare time, purely for fun. If you don&#039;t like the idea of someone doing something creative with South Park, then don&#039;t bother with this.

If you hit and run on this torrent and any other of mine (that is, download the whole thing and don&#039;t bother to seed) you thoroughly deserve to have your ISP poison your torrents.
